edwardbonnett_scriptreload.name: Script Reload
edwardbonnett_scriptreload.description: Auto reload script files in local folder projects. Recommend only if you really know what you're doing. Potentially could crash your project or stop working at any release.

script-refresh.name: Script refresh
script-refresh.desc: How frequently to check for file changes in ms (defaults to 2000 ms)

log-messages.name: Log messages
log-messages.desc: Log to the console a check is run, or a file is changed for debugging purposes
